profiles.name: Republic of Aurelia
profiles.description: An idealistic democratic republic struggling to maintain stability under population pressure.
profiles.first_crisis_hint: Rising unemployment and urban overcrowding have triggered mass protests.

profiles.name: Federation of Caldria
profiles.description: A powerful industrial federation with immense wealth but questionable ethical practices.
profiles.first_crisis_hint: Whistleblowers expose widespread industrial pollution and worker exploitation.

profiles.name: Kingdom of Norvale
profiles.description: A centralized monarchy with strong order but weakening public legitimacy.
profiles.first_crisis_hint: A royal succession controversy sparks reformist protests.

profiles.name: Union of Sahari
profiles.description: A fragile developing state facing economic hardship and resource scarcity.
profiles.first_crisis_hint: A failed harvest and fuel shortages threaten national food security.

profiles.name: Maritime State of Velmora
profiles.description: A globally connected trading state highly dependent on international supply chains.
profiles.first_crisis_hint: A major international trade route disruption threatens imports and exports.
